installCommand: curl -L https://storage.googleapis.com/flutter_infra_release/releases/stable/linux/flutter_linux_3.27.2-stable.tar.xz | tar -xJ && export PATH="$PATH:`pwd`/flutter/bin" && flutter precache --web && flutter doctor
buildCommand: . ~/.bashrc && export PATH="$PATH:`pwd`/flutter/bin" && flutter pub get && flutter build web --target=lib/main_web.dart --release
